user-email.wrongEmail: this is not a first responder email we recognise

what-happened.required: You must enter details of the exploitation

who-exploited-pv.required: You must enter details about the exploiter(s)

pv-want-to-submit-nrm.required: You must enter the NRM decision

does-pv-need-support.required: You must select if support is required

pv-name-that-requires-support-first-name.required: You must enter the potential victim's first name

pv-name-that-requires-support-last-name.required: You must enter the potential victim's last name

pv-dob.date: You must enter a valid date
pv-dob.before: Date cannot be in the future
pv-dob.after: This date appears to be too far in the past

pv-gender.required: You must select the potential victim's gender

pv-nationality.required: You must select the potential victim's nationality

pv-contact-details.required: You must select one or more of the contact methods listed

pv-contact-details-email-input.required: You must enter an email address
pv-contact-details-email-input.email: You must enter a valid email address

pv-contact-details-email-check.required: Make sure it is safe to contact the potential victim at this email addresss.

pv-contact-details-post-check.required: Make sure it is safe to contact the potential victim at this addresss.

supporting-document-upload.filesize: That file is too big. We only accept files smaller than 100mb
